description.value:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger Your turn begins.

You tap into the future to steal a bit of time from yourself a few seconds from now that you can use immediately. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] for 1 round, and can use the extra action to take any basic or specialty basic 1-action action. You gain this extra action immediately and can use it this turn. At the end of your turn, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} and are immune to the quickened condition until the end of your next turn.

publication.title: Pathfinder #219: Lord of the Trinity Star
